name: ContentFailure
desc: An object that describes why the client can’t play a specific piece of content.

items.name: errorDomain
items.desc: The error’s domain. This is com.apple.sirikitcloudmedia.errorDomain.

items.name: url
items.desc: The URL of the content the client can’t play.

items.name: underlyingError
items.desc: An object that, when present, provides additional information about why the content fails to play.
